subject: Golf
Canadian Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Hunter Mahan birdied the final three holes for an eight-under 64 in the second round in Oakville, Ontario. John Merrick was second after a 62, which tied the course record.
snippet: Hunter Mahan birdied the final three holes for an eight-under 64 in the second round in Oakville, Ontario. John Merrick was second after a 62, which tied the course record.
